PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
After playing a card, lose HP equal to the number of [E] you have past 3. (This number can be affected by powers and relics)
Negates damage before Block is lost.
For each attack, also take half that attack's damage (rounded down) and reduce Ionize by 1.
You gain no energy at the start of your turn, and energy is conserved between turns.
Every 6th card played in a turn is played twice. The copy does not trigger #yVolatile #yAether or #yAetherburn.
Gain [E] after playing a card. The number of [E] gained doubles every 3 cards played and resets each turn.
